Control Name: 3.11 Ensure that Object-level logging for read events is enabled for S3 bucket
Control Statement: S3 object-level API operations such as GetObject, DeleteObject, and PutObject are called data events. By default, CloudTrail trails don't log data events and so it is recommended to enable Object-level logging for S3 buckets.
